feature_descriptions.carrier_id: Unique identifier for the logistics carrier handling the shipment
feature_descriptions.warehouse_id: Unique identifier for the origin warehouse/fulfillment center
feature_descriptions.origin_region: Geographic region of shipment origin (Northeast, Southeast, Midwest, South, West)
feature_descriptions.distance_band: Categorized distance: Short (<100 km), Medium (100-500 km), Long (>500 km)
feature_descriptions.service_level: Selected shipping service level: Ground, Fast, or Express
feature_descriptions.order_to_ship_days: Number of days from order placement to warehouse departure
feature_descriptions.ship_dayofweek: Day of week when shipment departed (0=Monday, 6=Sunday)

encoding_strategy.method: Convert categorical features to category codes using pandas .cat.codes
encoding_strategy.note: AutoML (FLAML) handles encoding internally for tree-based models

data_source.join_strategy: Left joins from shipments to carriers and warehouses on foreign keys

preprocessing_steps: 1. Load tables from semantic model using sempy.fabric
2. Join shipments with carriers on carrier_id
3. Join result with warehouses on warehouse_id
4. Handle duplicate origin_region columns from join
